metadata.dc:title: US Wheat Yield vs. Salzburg Middle-Aged Marriages
metadata.dc:creator: Helmuth Breitenfellner (https://orcid.org/0000-0003-4523-0945)
metadata.dc:subject: Correlation of US Wheat Yield and Salzburg Middle-Aged Marriages, 1973-2014
metadata.dc:description: Investigation of the correlation between the US wheat yield and the marriages of middle-aged spouses in Salzburg between 1972 and 2014.
